### Tip: Always Use Versioning


### Tip: `module purge` when you're done


### Full Script Example

```{bash}
#| eval: false
#| filename: example_script.sh
#!/bin/bash
module load SAMtools/1.19.2-GCC-13.2.0
samtools view -c $1 > $1.counts.txt
module purge
```
